action.action-desc: Mr. Rodney Davis of Illinois (for himself and Mr. Peters) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To require the Administrator of General Services to issue guidance relating to the procurement of reclaimed refrigerants.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Federal Refrigerant Management and Stewardship Act of 2017.

section.header: Promoting use of reclaimed refrigerants in public buildings

subsection.text: Not later than 180 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the Administrator of General Services shall issue guidance relating to the procurement of reclaimed refrigerants to service existing equipment in public buildings.
The guidance issued under subsection (a) shall give preference to the use of reclaimed refrigerants ifâ€”

paragraph.text: the refrigerant has been reclaimed by an individual or entity that is certified under the laboratory certification program of the Air Conditioning, Heating, and Refrigeration Institute; and
the price of the reclaimed refrigerant does not exceed the price of a newly manufactured refrigerant.
